articles.author: Jagmeet Singh
articles.title: Apple and Google take down malicious mobile apps from their app stores - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple and Google have pulled as many as 20 apps from their respective apps for carrying a data-stealing malware.
articles.content:
Apple and Google have pulled as many as 20 apps from their respective app stores after security researchers found the apps were carrying data-stealing malware for almost a year.
Security researchers… [+1770 chars]
